leftSideLocation.container: public handle(intercon ModelInterpretationContext, model Model) : void
leftSideLocation.name: ModelUtil.setProperty(intercon,propertyModel.getName(),getValue(source,defaultValue),scope);

rightSideLocation.container: public handle(intercon ModelInterpretationContext, model Model) : void
rightSideLocation.name: PropertyModelHandlerHelper.setProperty(intercon,propertyModel.getName(),getValue(source,defaultValue),scope);

leftSideLocation.container: protected apply(logFile LogFile, resolver PropertyResolver) : void
leftSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(LoggingSystemProperty.FILE_THRESHOLD,resolver);

rightSideLocation.container: protected apply(logFile LogFile, resolver PropertyResolver) : void
rightSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(LoggingSystemProperty.FILE_THRESHOLD,resolver,this::thresholdMapper);

leftSideLocation.container: private setSystemProperty(property LoggingSystemProperty, resolver PropertyResolver, defaultValue String) : void
leftSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(property.getEnvironmentVariableName(),value);

rightSideLocation.container: private setSystemProperty(property LoggingSystemProperty, resolver PropertyResolver, defaultValue String, mapper Function<String,String>) : void
rightSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(property.getEnvironmentVariableName(),mapper.apply(value));

leftSideLocation.container: protected apply(logFile LogFile, resolver PropertyResolver) : void
leftSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(LoggingSystemProperty.CONSOLE_THRESHOLD,resolver);

rightSideLocation.container: protected apply(logFile LogFile, resolver PropertyResolver) : void
rightSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(LoggingSystemProperty.CONSOLE_THRESHOLD,resolver,this::thresholdMapper);

leftSideLocation.container: protected apply(logFile LogFile, resolver PropertyResolver) : void
leftSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(LoggingSystemProperty.CONSOLE_THRESHOLD,resolver);

rightSideLocation.container: private setSystemProperty(property LoggingSystemProperty, resolver PropertyResolver, mapper Function<String,String>) : void
rightSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(property,resolver,null,mapper);

leftSideLocation.container: private setSystemProperty(property LoggingSystemProperty, resolver PropertyResolver) : void
leftSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(property,resolver,null);

rightSideLocation.container: private setSystemProperty(property LoggingSystemProperty, resolver PropertyResolver, mapper Function<String,String>) : void
rightSideLocation.name: setSystemProperty(property,resolver,null,mapper);

leftSideLocation.container: public scrape(format PrometheusOutputFormat, includedNames Set<String>) : WebEndpointResponse<String>
leftSideLocation.name: return new WebEndpointResponse<>(scrapePage,format);

rightSideLocation.container: public scrape(format PrometheusOutputFormat, includedNames Set<String>) : WebEndpointResponse<byte[]>
rightSideLocation.name: return new WebEndpointResponse<>(content,format);

leftSideLocation.container: public scrape(format PrometheusOutputFormat, includedNames Set<String>) : WebEndpointResponse<String>
leftSideLocation.name: this.nextMetricsScrapeSize=scrapePage.length() + METRICS_SCRAPE_CHARS_EXTRA;

rightSideLocation.container: public scrape(format PrometheusOutputFormat, includedNames Set<String>) : WebEndpointResponse<byte[]>
rightSideLocation.name: this.nextMetricsScrapeSize=content.length + METRICS_SCRAPE_CHARS_EXTRA;

leftSideLocation.container: public scrape(format PrometheusOutputFormat, includedNames Set<String>) : WebEndpointResponse<String>
leftSideLocation.name: String scrapePage=outputStream.toString();

rightSideLocation.container: public scrape(format PrometheusOutputFormat, includedNames Set<String>) : WebEndpointResponse<byte[]>
rightSideLocation.name: byte[] content=outputStream.toByteArray();
